title: Last Flight from Flagstaff
description: A year ago, Donna lost someone very special. Now his daughter needs her help. Kristen is getting married in a week in her hometown of Flagstaff, but unanswered questions are casting a pall over the festivities. She hires Donna to investigate.When Donna arrived in Flagstaff, she finds that things are a little more complicated than Kristen implied. Kristen’s fiancé manages the business in question but funds are missing and the books are a mess. Throw in an attractive uncle who owns said business, a sweet old dog and a pushy wedding planner, and Donna has her hands full. Can she clear Kristen’s fiancé and save the wedding without breaking her own heart?
author: Beth  Carpenter
